text: Hellboy is a 2004 movie. It was directed by Guillermo del Toro and stars Ron Perlman. It is based on the Dark Horse Comics character of the same name. It had a 2008 sequel made by Universal called Hellboy II: The Golden Army. == Cast == *Ron Perlman as Hellboy *Doug Jones as Abe Sapien **David Hyde Pierce as voice of Abe Sapien *Selma Blair as Liz Sherman *Jeffrey Tambor as Thomas Manning *John Hurt ==Other websites== * * Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:2004 fantasy movies Category:German fantasy movies Category:Hellboy movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:Movies directed by Guillermo del Toro Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in 2004 Category:2000s apocalyptic movies Category:American superhero movies
title: Hellboy (2004 movie)
